welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kings Norton, where history meets modern charm! Enjoy our quaint streets, vibrant community, and rich culture. We invite you to explore our city and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'BHX Free WiFi' network and follow the instructions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles the transportation and storage of goods and products.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
